about-main-subtitle: Junior Frontend Developer who is passionate about creating user-friendly and modern web interfaces I have experience working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I am constantly improving my skills and learning new tools and practices.
text-01: I am Valentyna, a front-end developer who sincerely loves creating beautiful and user-friendly websites. I enjoy seeing ideas turn into real interfaces. I strive to develop in the field of web development and improve my skills every day.
text-02: Capable of working both independently and as part of a team. I can collaborate effectively with colleagues, exchanging ideas and finding optimal solutions.
